body: I'm on an old potato computer running a many years outdated version of firefox, but in the last day or so I've had a bug where the side-bar appears in the middle of the screen, instead of on the side. Anyone else getting that?
body_html: I'm on an old potato computer running a many years outdated version of firefox, but in the last day or so I've had a bug where the side-bar appears in the middle of the screen, instead of on the side. Anyone else getting that?
title: Is anyone else having a bug where the side-bar is appearing in the middle of the screen?

body: Yeah, just had it the other day, something about specific posts.
body_html: Yeah, just had it the other day, something about specific posts.

body:
It happens when there's a line of text that's too long.

TextTextTextTextTextTextTextTextTextTextTextTextText...
@kek

Edit (2020-11-19): The long line of text was getting annoying, so I got rid of it.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>

It happens when there's a line of text that's too long.
